person.name: Iolo
person.topic: I play for the people.
Good.
I play my lute and receive the good wishes of the people.Do you like my music?I would join thee!A shame.
If you treat someone else well then they will have reason to do the same.

person.name: Gweno
person.topic: I dance and sing for the children.
Very well.
Dance is good for the soul.Do you give to the needy?Beggars are thankful for small donations.Alas.
To give to a beggar shows compassion.

person.name: a child
person.topic: Singing
Very happy.
The song goes: Ho eyo he hum!
It means: Love to one and all!Do you like the song?Then help us spread the word!Too bad.

person.name: a guard
person.topic: I guard the bridge.
Good.
Across the bridge our people dance and sing!Would thou like to join them?Remember, an open heart is the first step on the path to wisdom!Then you have no business across the bridge.
Yep.

person.name: Pepper
person.topic: I am a fighting bard.
Healthy.
Bards know many things.Dost thou seek something?What might that be?Alas, I may have been able to help.
The rune of compassion lies at the end of a hall somewhere in this towne.

person.name: Thevel
person.topic: I search for the mystery of the magic orbs.
Fairly well.
A one-handed beggar knows their secrets!Hast thou seen him?Only he knows the orb's gift!Find him in Serpent castle for he knows of orbs!
Magic orbs.

person.name: Joe
person.topic: Yo ho ho... and a bottle... of rum... hic...
And a bottle of...
The yellow stone is in the dungeon Despise...
Rum... hic...Give me rum?...Thanxth... my friend Joe can help with the stones... hic...Ah, be a joe!

person.name: Cricket
person.topic: Shhh, I'm playing!
Shhh
Yes, shhh!Now wilt thou be quiet?Thanks.I am going to call the guards!
The mantra for the shrine of compassion is 'MU'!

person.name: a guard
person.topic: I am a guard of course!
I am fully healed.
We guards have a lot of compassion.
We always say: Let all others' troubles be as thine own!Dost thou kill non-evil creatures?That does not show compassion!Good.

person.name: a child
person.topic: I am learning compassion.
O.K.
The solution to ones problems often lies in solving others!
Never care so much for thyself that thou cannot care for others!Know ye the mantra of compassion?Good.Ask Cricket!

person.name: Shalimar
person.topic: I watch over the children.
Good.
It takes a good deal of compassion to deal with children!
Compassion strengthens the soul as knowledge tempers the mind!Have any kids?Thou dost know what I mean!Too bad.

person.name: Sebastian
person.topic: I know a terrible secret!
Not so well.
Mondain's influence has not left the world!
An artifact remains! I heard at Buccaneer's Den!Wilt thou find and destroy it?Then ask at the pub there of the skull!Oh.

person.name: Shapero
person.topic: I am looking for Julio.
All right.
He knows the true nature of compassion.Art thou on the Quest of the Avatar?Find the shrine of compassion east across 2 bridges!Too bad.
Seek out Julio and ask him of compassion!

person.name: Julio
person.topic: I seek the true nature of things!
Solemn.
All things have a true nature!Dost thou know the true nature of all things?Thou art a liar and a braggart.No mortal can.
Compassion derives itself from unending love!

person.name: Mentor
person.topic: I escaped Magincia!
I am well.
Pride was too great in Magincia!
The city was destroyed by daemons for its pride!Art thou proud?That is not a virtue!Pride exists without truth, love, or courage!

person.name: Sprite
person.topic: I have no job so now I beg!
I fear I shall die of starvation!
I have not eaten in a week!
Please! Help me!Wilt thou help me?In return I shall tell thee that Pepper knows of the rune!I shall starve to death!
